== Purpose ==

The Ubuntu Translations Coordinators team is a group of community members actively involved in the Ubuntu translation process who take care of all the associated administrative and coordinative actions. They will also act as mediators and take a leading role if disputes or conflict situations regarding translations arise.

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-translations-coordinators/+mugshots|Team members in Launchpad]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[..-Translations-Contact#UTC|Contact]]</nowiki>

{i} If you are instead looking for information on how to translate Ubuntu, you probably want to go to the general <nowiki>[[Translations|Ubuntu Translations site]]</nowiki>.

== Actions ==

''These are the actions or activities the team takes care of''

* <nowiki>[[Actions-ImportQueueManagement|Ubuntu translations import queue management in Launchpad]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[Actions-TranslationTeamsCoordination|Coordination of teams in the ubuntu-translators group]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[Actions-LpTemplateAdministration|Administration of Ubuntu translation templates in Launchpad]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[Actions-Announcements|Announcements related to translations]]</nowiki>
* Bug triaging - note that this process is open to all the translations community, but the UTC team will generally take a more active role in filing and triaging bugs since they are the bugmail contact and usually the first ones to notice and report errors in the imports queue.
* <nowiki>[[Actions-AppointingNewMembers|Appointing new team members]]</nowiki>
